title: Collaborative Online Internship Design to Strengthen Integrated Pharmacy Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pharmaceutical theory and practical terminology
context.additional_context: Case-based learning design considering the relevance to the work environment of current practitioners.

learning_goals: Learners can perform problem-solving processes with 80% accuracy through role-divided collaborative learning while analyzing real pharmaceutical cases
Learners achieve 2.5+ points on a three-level evaluation scale for knowledge structuring abilities based on peer feedback using LMS discussion features
Learners demonstrate over 90% achievement of integrated pharmaceutical curriculum objectives through analysis of five or more practical cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
